original_text: Hezekiah and all the people were happy because God had helped them. They had been able to do the work on the temple very quickly.
korean_text: 이 일이 갑자기 되었으나 하나님께서 백성을 위하여 예비하셨으므로 히스기야가 백성과 더불어 기뻐하였더라

sentences.original_text: Hezekiah and all the people were happy
They had been able to do the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 일을 할 수 있었습니다
